xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 3 Cūḷantaraduka, Kusalattika » 3.4 Sappaṭighaduka, Kusalattika » 3.4.2 Abyākatapada » 3.4.2.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Cūḷantaraduka, Kusalattika
Sappaṭighaduka, Kusalattika
Abyākatapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
32.
1528Sappaṭigho abyākato dhammo sappaṭighassa abyākatassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
33.
1529Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1530Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1531Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe dve. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1532(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
1533Sappaṭighadukakusalattikaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
<< Hetuup3.5 Rūpīduka, Kusalattika >>
